document.full_text: with the odds stacked against her, angelica bermudez overcame family issues and a rocky start at kean university and is now close to landing a spot on a women's professional team in puerto rico.
document.title: dear diary, i want to belong
lines_and_colors: with the odds stacked against her, angelica bermudez overcame family issues and a rocky start at kean university and is now close to landing a spot on a women's professional team in puerto rico.
